Still one of my favorite games. Great story, amazing and funny charecters, great puzzles and gameplay, amazing atmosphere especially in the chapters in the botttom of aperture narrated by Cave. If you haven't played this game buy it now you wont regret it.
10 Спроектированных дураков из 10 !!

Quem jogou o primeiro, simplesmene deve jogar este também.
Você continua sendo o único humano no jogo e a GlaDos continua aparecendo com seu jeito sarcástico e carismático.
Não possui um enredo trabalhado, com uma trama de cair o queixo, mas os simples comentários durante o jogo já fazem com que cada personagem tenha seu espaço especial durante todo o jogo.
Os puzzles são bem desafiantes (sinceramente tive que apelar ao youtube em algumas partes kkk) e bem diversificados, nada de ficar fazendo a mesma coisa toda hora.

Отличная игрушка, прямое продолжение первой части с очень приятными плюшками в виде приятной графики и более детального сюжета, а также множества новых инструментов. Игра не слишком сложная и не слишком простая, подлиннее первой части. Концовка вообще эпик ;)
Есть весьма интересный кооператив с отдельными испытаниями для двоих. В общем своих денег точно стоит, рекомендую всем этот шедевр :3

齁勝

This game was super amazingly fun with a very in depth storyline telling you all you ever wanted to know and more about the mysteries of the Portal world. I play this whole game at once taking me around 6 1/2 hours, which was a terrible idea, and I hads loads of fun with all of the well designed puzzles and the dialogue between characters. If you have $5 in your steam wallet, you seriously NEED to buy this game ASAP!

After playing 'Portal 2', I've got to say, I was VERY impressed. They took Portal 1 and pretty much improved it in every way. The characters are very charming and funny and felt they really improved with the writing in this game compared to the original. It is still more of the same as the original, but puzzle solving with portals is very fun and engaging with the characters providing comic relief throughout without it feeling overbearing. I strongly recommend this game!

Portal 2 is an awesome puzzle game. Played it twice on console and replayed again on PC. Great co-op missions that require teamwork. If you get tired of story and co-op then the community levels will provide an endless source of new levels.

Go Go Go

This game is the fleshed out version of the first Portal with that one being the prototype in my opinion. This game makes up for what the last game didnt have including:

+Improved graphics
+much better storyline
+gels
+multiplayer
+community made chambers that are extremely easy to download
+altogther better gameplay

It really is a great game and would highly suggest buying it on sale with the portal bundle
great game. fun. enjoyable

The first Portal was spectacular.  With the voice acting, humor, and puzzles...  I loved it.

With such a high standard to meet I was a little worried this would fall flat by comparison.  But it didn't, Valve maintained what was so great about the first while bringing in new elements.  The humor is just as good, with additional characters for more development.  The amazing portal gun received company in the form of some new inventions and puzzle mechanics.  The best part however was the voice acting.  J.K. Simmons is prefect as Cave Johnson.  For his work alone I would recommend this game.
